title: BRIEF-Tiso Blackstar Sees FY Headline Loss Per Share Of Between 46.96 Cents And 50.49 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Tiso Blackstar Sees FY Headline Loss Per Share Of Between 46.96 Cents And 50.49 Cents

Stock Markets 42 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 17:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Tiso Blackstar Sees FY Headline Loss Per Share Of Between 46.96 Cents And 50.49 Cents Oct 15 (Reuters) - Tiso Blackstar Group SE : * TRADING STATEMENT * TRADING PERFORMANCE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS REMAINED STABLE OVER FINANCIAL YEAR ENDED 30 JUNE 2019 * SEES FY HEADLINE LOSS PER SHARE OF BETWEEN 46.96 CENTS AND 50.49 CENTS * SEES FY BASIC LOSS PER SHARE OF BETWEEN 204.49 CENTS AND 221.64 CENTS

BRIEF-Tiso Blackstar Sees FY Headline Loss Per Share Of Between 46.96 Cents And 50.49 Cents
description: BRIEF-Tiso Blackstar Sees FY Headline Loss Per Share Of Between 46.96 Cents And 50.49 Cents
